page.title: 20WILLINGDON LOCAL NEWS
page.content: We have recorded events published in the following local newspapers, printed during Saturday 4th May to Saturday 11th May 1985:- 1.Eastbourne Gazette and Herald 2.Sussex Express 3.Evening Argus Here is a selection of main events: A new Society of Friends of Polegate Windmill has been launched in an attempt to preserve the mill. A collection was organised by the Polegate and Willingdon District Committee of the East Sussex Assn. for the Disabled and it raised Â£805. Two boys raised Â£259.74 for the Glaucoma Association. An exhibition of paintings was staged at Willingdon Church Hall in aid of St. Wilfred's Hospice. The Conservatives won the Polegate seat on East Sussex County Council. (Written by Willingdon C P School)
